title: Radical Index
text: What is the index of the radical?
speech: What is the index of the radical?
pacedSpeech: What is the index of the radical?

title: Even radical index
text: Since the radical index is $$2$$, it is even, so, the radicand must be greater than or equal to $$0$$.
speech: Since the radical index is  2 , it is even, so, the radicand must be greater than or equal to  0, .

title: Solving the Radicand
speech: Solve , 4 x minus 2, is greater than or equal to 0
pacedSpeech: Solve  , 4 x minus 2, is greater than or equal to 0

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Add $$2$$ to both sides of the inequality and get $$4x$$ is greater than and equal to $$2$$.
speech: Add , 2  to both sides of the inequality and get  4 x  is greater than and equal to  2 .

is greater than and equal to   2

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Divide both sides of the inequality by $$4$$ which gives $$x$$ is greater than and equal to $$\frac{1}{2}$$. We can turn it into interval notation as $$[\frac{1}{2},\infty)$$.
speech: Divide both sides of the inequality by  4  which gives  x  is greater than and equal to  1 half . We can turn it into interval notation as , the closed open interval from 1 half to infinity .
